addr: 613 South Grand Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90017
title: COMEDY JACKPOT: THE STAND UP COMEDY GAMESHOW
desc: This is an amazing free weekly comedy show in downtown LA, with a twist. We showcase the best comics in LA and give away prizes the whole night like Chipotle gift cards, free drinks, poetry on the spot,cash and a big mystery prize! This has been rated as one of the best live shows in downtown LA by Culture Trip magazine and has continued to grow for over 4 years as one of the best shows in LA. We give away free drinks and prizes during the show and we have ping pong tables, darts and pool tables for after the show. The show is in the back room. See you there!
